title: Video: WATERS – For The One
content:
This new video from former Port O’Brien front man Van Pierszalowski, now recording under the moniker WATERS, may well be the most bizarre video you will ever see.

Featuring a crazed barber, old couples making out and plenty of psychedelic imagery, For The One is quite an experience. Based around the concept of a twisted, distorted dream, it’s a far from serious production, and will most likely leave you wondering what the hell you’ve just spent the last four minutes watching. Thankfully, the track itself is a brilliantly energetic slice of guitar driven punk, far rawer and brash than any of Pierszalowski’s work with Port O’Brien. WATERS debut album Out In The Light is released next Monday through City Slang.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
